Articles.Content:
Someone was looking for a Minimus SSTO but I cant find the post anymore.  Here is mine from my career game.  It has enough dv to land on minimus but not the Mun.  It could use bigS wings, a shielded docking port, and a little AOI which I have yet to unlock.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B0iPRE-stt2CSXRzY1YwSVN5NWM/view?usp=sharing
